description.value: Though referred to as a breastplate, this type of armor consists of several pieces of plate or half‑plate armor (page 276) that protect the torso, chest, neck, and sometimes the hips and lower legs. It strategically grants some of the protection of plate while allowing greater flexibility and speed.
description.label: Description

description.value: A healing potion is a vial of a ruby-red liquid that imparts a tingling sensation as the drinker’s wounds heal rapidly. When you drink a healing potion, you regain the listed number of Hit Points.
description.label: Description

description.value: This large crossbow is harder to load and more substantial than a regular crossbow, but it packs a greater punch.
description.label: Description

description.value: Shorter than traditional arrows but similar in construction, bolts are the ammunition used by crossbows.
description.label: Description

description.value: This one‑handed curved blade is sharp on one side.
description.label: Description

description.value:
Trigger: A creature within the monster’s reach uses a manipulate action or a move action, makes a ranged attack, or leaves a square during a move action it’s using.

The monster attempts a melee @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.VjxZFuUXrCU94MWR]{Strike} against the triggering creature. If the attack is a critical hit and the trigger was a manipulate action, the monster disrupts that action. This @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.VjxZFuUXrCU94MWR]{Strike} doesn’t count toward the monster’s multiple attack penalty, and its multiple attack penalty doesn’t apply to this @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.VjxZFuUXrCU94MWR]{Strike}.

A Zephyr Guard takes no penalty for making nonlethal attacks with a weapon that doesn’t have the nonlethal trait. The guard’s nonlethal Strikes against a creature that is not wielding a weapon deal an additional [[/r 2d6]] damage.

The Zephyr Guard attempts to @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.Dt6B1slsBy8ipJu9]{Disarm} a creature, with a +2 circumstance bonus to the roll. On a critical success, the guard can also deal their @Compendium[pf2e.equipment-srd.grmaV4GdoGD7sKbn]{Scimitar} damage to the creature.

The Zephyr Guard makes a @Compendium[pf2e.equipment-srd.giO4LwIKGzJZoaxa]{Heavy Crossbow} @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.VjxZFuUXrCU94MWR]{Strike} that deals one additional weapon damage die. If the @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.VjxZFuUXrCU94MWR]{Strike} hits, the target takes a –10-foot status penalty to its Speeds and is slowed 1. These last for 1 round, or 2 rounds if the @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.VjxZFuUXrCU94MWR]{Strike} was a critical success.
